name: Refine Presentation Outline
description: Finalize the 8-slide structure, ensuring each slide is beginner-friendly, avoids crypto jargon, and ties to the New Earth theme. Focus on clear storytelling with mycelium analogies and Gitcoin examples.

name: Create Visuals for Slides
description: Design simple, nature-inspired visuals (e.g., mycelium networks, community projects) for each slide. Include diagrams for Gitcoin funding flow and local-to-global nodes. Use vibrant images to inspire.

name: Practice Delivery
description: Rehearse the 15-minute presentation to ensure a warm, accessible tone. Time it to leave 5-10 minutes for Q&A. Practice explaining ‘spiritual science’ and Web3 for newcomers.

name: Prepare Q&A Responses
description: Draft answers for potential audience questions (e.g., ‘What is Web3?’ or ‘How does mycelium inspire tech?’). Include a brief acknowledgment of crypto’s challenges (e.g., tech access) to build trust.
